attributes.action: Restrict fireworks to authorised displays on specific occasions.
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to ban all sales of fireworks to the public, their use should be restricted to official displays.
attributes.background: Sales of fireworks to the public should be banned as it’s impossible to regulate their use. In addition to distress inadvertently caused to pets, wildlife and people suffering from PTSD, fireworks facilitate deliberate antisocial behaviour towards elderly people and pets.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868
